data.title: Piano player Roy Webb
data.text:
Post by Jr.

His father was dying of cancer and he has been estranged from his father for

some years now. Ernie told Roy to go home and reconcile with his father

before his dad passed away.

It appears that Roy has decided not to come back.

This is not a surprise seeing how Roy will be picking up his masters degree

in jazz piano this year from college. I had expected him to leave anyway.

Post by dodger

The announcement of Roy Webb's departure from Signature Sound sure

didn't give much in the way of detail. Why did he

leave????????????????

Dodger- Hide quoted text -

- Show quoted text -

Thanks....the announcement really didn't say much of anything. Usually

it is said so and so will be leaving such and such group in order to

etcv etc etc. This said basically nothing.

Dodger
